subject: Chemistry
question_text: Given below are some nitrogen containing compounds 2025 (29 Jan Shift 1) JEE Main 2025 January JEE Main Previous Year Paper MathonGo Mg Mg 2+ (aq) + (aq) Ag ∣∣∣ E = E o − RT 2 F ln [Ag + ] [Mg 2+ ] E = E o + RT 2 F ln [Ag + ] 2 [Mg 2+ ] E = E o − RT 2 F ln [Ag + ] 2 [Mg 2+ ] E = E o − RT 2 F ln [Mg 2+ ] [Ag + ] ′ P ′ Δ o [Mn(CN) 6 ] 3− [Co(CN) 6 ] 4− [Fe(CN) 6 ] 4− [Fe(CN) 6 ] 3− IV < III < II < I I < II < IV < < < < < < < (FeCr 2 O 4 ) Na 2 3 O 2 gmol −1 Each of them is treated with HCl separately. 1.0 g of the most basic compound will consume _______ mg of HCl.
